channel.title: Blockchain on Just my blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blockchain on Just my blog

item.title: Blockchain and Bitcoin links
item.description: This posts contains links to some articles, blog posts and other materials which looks interesting for me, give good explanation/description of the field and simply put are pleasure to read. A blockchain in 200 lines of code The blockchain explained to web developers. Part 1: The Theory How migh we use blockchains outside cryptocurrencies Mastering Bitcoin - open source book on Bitcoin published by OReilly Awesome Bitcoin - GitHub repo with bitcoin-related links collection
